generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and arrows, which is the primary surface for vehicle movement.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to parked cars and buildings, with a curb separating it from the road.
- building: Several buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees are prominently visible along the street and in the background, with some foliage partially obscuring the view.
- terrain: Grass and other low-lying vegetation are visible along the roadside and in the median strip.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at an intersection ahead, showing red lights.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a yellow sign with text and a circular sign with a red border.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road and parked along the side of the street.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the street.
